remarks.para: Left and right VHF transmitters and receivers required for IMC operations.

numlitem.para: Verify Left and Right VHF Transmitters and Receivers are operative.
Complete Flight Data Coupon as described in FOM, Chapter 3.
For International operations the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and Company VHF communications requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec A008 and reference FOM Communications Chapter 4 for additional information.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s Audio Select Panel "C VHF AND ACARS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Inoperative R/T must be in the VHF center position.
Open and collar center VHF circuit breaker (P11G4).
Open and collar ACARS MU circuit breaker (P11G6).
